author: DryRun
body:
#### PR description:

**Prototype implementation for use by HCAL DPG, not ready for merging yet**

This PR implements a NanoAOD format for HCAL digis and RecHits. This data format is intended to replace the old [HcalTupleMaker](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cmshcal/hcalpfg/HcalTupleMaker) used by most HCAL workflows. 

The two object collections are implemented separately: 
- RecHits 
   - Follows @kdlong's PFNano branch, https://github.com/kdlong/cmssw/tree/pfNano_HCALOnly_12_6_0_pre4; defined in `DPGAnalysis/CaloNanoAOD`. 
- Digis 
   -  Handled by dedicated modules in `DPGAnalysis/HcalNanoAOD` that output dense arrays, sorted by DetId. 
   - List of DetIds, i.e. column labels, is placed in `Run`. (For the moment, DetIds are also saved in `Event`.)

TBD: trigger primitives, calibration metadata. 

#### PR validation:

Produces useful HCAL NanoAOD ntuples. Data validated event-by-event against HcalTupleMaker.

#### Other
The contents of this PR are ready for use by HCAL DPG right away, but an eventual merge should come after @kdlong 's PFNano. 

@mariadalfonso @wang-hui
title: Add prototype HcalNanoAOD
